channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-19935] Hive WM session killed: Failed to update LLAP tasks count
item.description:
I'm getting this error with WM feature quite frequently. It causes AM containers to shut down and a new one created to replace it.

item.summary: Hive WM session killed: Failed to update LLAP tasks count

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: prasanth_j can you take a look? a small race condition if the task is deallocated just before we send an update.
